problem.markdown:
>>Cardioveter is combination of<< ( ) ECG and EEG ( ) ECG and EMG ( ) ECG and defibrillator ( ) ECG and EOG
>>The approximate electrode size with ohmic resistance 50 to 100 ohm is<< ( ) 80 sq cm ( ) 10000 sq cm ( ) 4500 sq cm ( ) None of the above
>>The electrodes required in case of defibrillator are<< ( ) Posterior ( ) anterior ( ) anterior and posterior ( ) None of the above
>>Defibrillator is required for restoring functionality of<< ( ) Lung ( ) Brain ( ) Heart ( ) Limbs
>>In the defibrillator circuit the energy stored in capacitor depends on<< ( ) capacitance ( ) voltage ( ) Current ( ) All of the above ( ) 1 and 2
